item.title: How Do i Run srl?
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

To make Srl work all you have to do is follow this.

  1. Open SRL and look for the plugins folder.

  2. Once you find it open it.

  3. now open up this C:\Program Folders\Scar 2.03\

  4. Open up the plugin folders for in that file.

  5. Press and hold Ctrl.

  6. Click on all of the plugins.

  7. Repeat these but with the includes

  8. Find a good script or make one.

  9. Run it and follow the directions.

  10. Enjoy your autoing

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i Run srl?
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

The main include is…

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

their is alot more includes heres the whole or mostly all of the includes…

{.include srl\srl\core\Globals.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\Setup.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\Users.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\Math.scar}
{.include srl\srl\misc\Conversions.scar}

{.include srl\srl\core\Login.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\Object.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\Inventory.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\AutoTalk.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\MapWalk.scar}
{.include srl\srl\core\RC.scar}

item.title: How Do i Run srl?
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

SRL is like a plugin for SCAR (called an include)

SCAR scripts use SRL to auto

so get a SCAR script that uses SRL
